MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the CH7 postcode area of Mold, affecting properties in Rose Lane, Chester Road, Alyn Lane and surrounding streets. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 12PM due to a faulty piece of equipment. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely on the overhead line network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 2:30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:05AM on 3rd April 2021.
